features: Innovative Knife Set Design - The Imarku kitchen knife set sets itself apart with a revolutionary dark red design. The premium Brazilian pakkawood handles and knives add sophistication to your kitchen. With an ergonomic handle design, this knife set provides exceptional comfort and grip for effortless meal prep.

Impressively Durable and Sharp - Our knife sets for kitchen with block include a chef knife set that is crafted from German high-carbon stainless steel to ensure unparalleled strength and resistance against rust and breakage. With an angle of 13°-15°, our blades are razor-sharp and ideal for precise cuts and effortless slicing.

Healthy and Easy Cleaning - The kitchen knife set's knife holder has a perforated bottom that allows moisture to dissipate, preventing the buildup of bacteria and ensuring a hygienic storage space for your knives. To prolong the lifespan of your knives set, we recommend wiping them dry after cleaning with a damp cloth or sponge. Please avoid washing them in the dishwasher.

Perfect Gift Choice with Guarantee - Our Professional kitchen Knife Set with Block makes a high-end gift box for special occasions such as Thanksgiving, Christmas, Father's and Mother's Day, weddings, and birthdays. We offer a 3-month refund and a lifetime free replacement warranty to ensure customer satisfaction.

Complete Kitchen Knife Set - The Imarku 16-piece knife block set includes all the necessary knives for your cooking needs, including a knife sharpening rod, a knife block, and 9 different kinds of knives, such as Chef knife, Santoku knife, Paring knife, Utility knife, Slicing knife, Bread knife, kitchen Shear, and Steak knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value and Quality Knife Set!
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money with a large variety of different knives for the occasion.What I really found to be nice was how well the knives gripped in my hands - the wooden handles were serenely polish, but was not slippery.The chef’s knife as well as the santoku knife was also nicely weighted, giving a comfortable chopping and slicing pattern on meat, hard vegetables, and other produces.The blades as the other reviewer mentioned was sharp, and the included sharpener are pretty standard.The 6 piece steak knives were also quite the upgrade compared to the ones I already have. They have a teethed section and a non teethed section, so you can control how you want to cut the meat. If its a tough cut, use the riveted section, and for melt-in-your-mouth or softer cuts, use the non riveted portion of the knives.I have been using iMarku knives for a while and I will say that they are definitely a great value. I’m also impressed they offer a 1 year warranty. The knife holder/case is also solid wood with a nice finish - there is no chemical smell that you find in some other cheaper brands - this one is heavy, has rubber grips at the bottom, and looks phenomenal on my kitchen table!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift packed and functional
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t looking for anything fancy so I was pleasantly surprised with the posh packaging. The knife is sturdy, has a nice weight and came nice and sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems legit, but is it really?
reviews.reviewText: I bought this knife set looking for a quality home set. From what I can see and feel, it appears to be of decent quality. The knives are extremely sharp and I tested it on cutting grapes. Very smooth and easy cut; no issues. The feel seems pretty solid as well and they look very nice. The only negative I have is after reading all the packaging and the brochure sent in the box (see pictures). The reputation of the company comes in question when the brochure shows two different ways of spelling their company name in the logo (imarku vs marku). Plus, there are so many misspelled words (even misspelled their name in the brochure) that it makes it comical and hard to understand. When you visit the site, same thing. It claims to be based out of California but really traces back to China. For now, after a week, the knives feel of decent quality. But, I fear they may not be based on other products purchased from China similarly provided with poor quality marketing. I think the company profile showed creation back to the 70s, but there is far and few information that can be found and traced on the internet. For a company to be in business that long yet can’t spell their name right, it makes me question the quality of the business and it’s products. Maybe they focus too much on autocorrect and can’t afford a quality control person. But, this seems to be they way of Amazon’s future companies and products. Advertising great products only to get lower Chinese quality on the back end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super sharp and look beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I always get tons of compliments on my knife set and how sharp they are. We’ve had them for over a year now and have only had to sharpen them once or so but the best part is they’re just beautiful cherry wood so I feel perfectly happy with leaving them on the counter. Great price, great value, bought as a gift for my sister she liked mine so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using a 6” bread knife that tends to hack up my home baked breads. After reading numerous reviews, I chose this mid priced knife knowing I could return if not satisfied. This knife is a keeper! It’s sharp and slices through my sour dough bread without tearing even the thinist slices. The knife is well balanced, well made and I expect will be in use many years.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice knives
reviews.reviewText: These knives are very nice. They are made with really nice wooden handles and the blades are strong and sharp. I highly recommend these knives.
